summary:
SmartContracts Tools - Decentralized products and services for Web3

 Token Generator - Create a Token in less than a minute with the most trusted Smart Contract Generator for ERC20 and BEP20. Available on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and Avalanche.

 Token Watcher - Create a Token Page for your ERC20 or BEP20 Token. Easily add your Token to MetaMask and share with your customers.

 Utilities - Create Address Page Coin History
proposal:
Hello everyone! 👋

Did you ever dream of having your own DEX or lottery? Or maybe you've been eyeing up that shiny new wallet, but just couldn't find the right one? Well, dreams do become reality at our B2B shop! 

We noticed that you guys are into creating ERC20 and BEP20 tokens with your fantastic Token Generator. That's awesome! We thought, why not take it a step further? 

With our DEX (UNI FACTORY), you can create your very own DEX based on Uniswap V2. And the best part? It won't cost you a dime. We only share revenue. Plus, you can customize it to your heart's content - colors, logo, menus, fees, tokenlist, you name it!

But why stop there? With our Lottery tool, you can set up a blockchain-based lottery and earn 0-30% commission. And if you're more into the farming business, our Farming tool lets you create ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming. 

And for those who like to keep everything under control, we've got a Wallet tool that lets you create a multicurrency crypto wallet. Plus, our DAO tool offers governance and proposals for your crypto token.

Lastly, our CrossChain tool lets you create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge, and our IDOFactory - Launchpad provides a solution for IDO pools and token locking.

It's all B2B, so you're not playing, you're creating. Interested? Let's chat! 👋
Check it out https://t.me/onoutdemos
